meanings.definition: A type of housing in which residents actively participate in the design and operation of their own community.
meanings.sent1: In cohousing, people work together to plan and run their neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The cohousing residents collaborated to create a beautiful shared garden.
meanings.sent3: The cohousing group had a meeting to decide on the color of the new playground.
meanings.sent4: Living in cohousing is like being part of a big family where everyone helps out.
meanings.sent5: The sense of community in cohousing makes it a unique and fulfilling way of living.

meanings.definition: The practice of living in a community where residents share common spaces and resources.
meanings.sent1: Cohousing promotes sharing facilities like kitchens and living rooms.
meanings.sent2: In our cohousing community, we have a shared library for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The cohousing arrangement made it easy for neighbors to borrow tools from each other.
meanings.sent4: Living in cohousing means always having friends nearby to chat with.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of cooperation in cohousing leads to a strong sense of belonging.
